blocking_issues.description: Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerability in `src/memory/provenance/service.py`. Despite comments claiming storage is bounded to prevent memory leaks (referencing a 'Council Round 9 fix'), the `_provenance_store` dictionary grows indefinitely with every new memory ID attached. The accompanying test `test_provenance_store_is_bounded` is logically flawed; it merely verifies that inserting 200 items results in a size <= 1000, which proves nothing about an actual upper limit or eviction policy. Given the explicit focus on security, this unmitigated memory leak warrants rejection."
